typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/silver/SalesOrderHeader') ~> SalesHeaderSilver
SalesHeaderSilver compose(mapColumn(
		DateColumn = ShipDate
	),
	composition: 'Time_Flowlet') ~> ShipDateFlowlet@(output1)
SalesHeaderSilver compose(mapColumn(
		DateColumn = OrderDate
	),
	composition: 'Time_Flowlet') ~> OrderDateFlowlet@(output1)
SalesHeaderSilver compose(mapColumn(
		DateColumn = DueDate
	),
	composition: 'Time_Flowlet') ~> DueDateFlowlet@(output1)
DueDateFlowlet@output1, ShipDateFlowlet@output1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1, OrderDateFlowlet@output1 union(byName: true)~> Union2
Select1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Union2 window(over(DateID),
	asc(Date, true),
	RowNum = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
Window1 filter(RowNum==1) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		DateID,
		Date,
		Year,
		Quarter,
		Month,
		WeekOfYear,
		DayOfMonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/gold/DimTime',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['DateID'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimTime
